text: Pepperdine University () is a private research university who works with the Churches of Christ. Their main campus is located near Malibu, California. It was founded by entrepreneur George Pepperdine in South Los Angeles in 1937. ==References== Category:1930s establishments in California Category:1937 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in California Category:Malibu, California Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States
title: Pepperdine University
